hero.title: Instyle Aesthetics
description: InStyle Aesthetics is a UK leading provider of premium aesthetic treatment.
In need of a new brand identity and website redesign, InStyle were looking for something more refined to represent the brand ethos of enhancing natural beauty.

projectDetails.title: Rebranding
projectDetails.description: I chose a more organic colour scheme with a pop of lilac to accompany a cursive logo to represent the enhancement of natural beauty.

projectDetails.title: Wireframes
projectDetails.description: I restructured content from the existing site to be more fluent in narration as before it was unclear of where to find relevant information.

projectDetails.title: Website Redesign
projectDetails.description: The existing site was bland and difficult to navigate through. I designed a more trusting, user friendly experience for customers to browse.

text: By updating InStyleâ€™s logo and colour palette to feel more organic, their branding now represents the treatments they offer in a more trusting and professional light.

With the existing site lacking general user functionality and character, the redesign is a massive improvement for customer growth. I used a bright and modern scheme paired with attractive photography to relay expertise and trust in the business.
